bibl.title: New Instrumental Music from Graeco-Roman Egypt.
bibl.note: Provenance unknown, A.D. I-III. The back contains a text in demotic. - 1. Transcription & commentary [including a translation into modern staff notation]. - 2. Physical characteristics. - 3. Rhythmical notation. - 4. Melodic notation. - 5. Instrument & performance. - Pp. 34-36: Appendix: Rhythmization in the second instrumental piece of the Berlin papyrus [P. Berol. Inv. 6870 (= Pack2 2439)].
bibl.seg: JOHNSON William A., New Instrumental Music from Graeco-Roman Egypt.
